mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select * from vwClass order by seq desc) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by rnum asc

select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select * from vwClass vc inner join tblCategory cc on vc.cseq = cc.seq where cc.name = #{searchWord} order by vc.seq desc) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by rnum asc
select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select * from vwClass where nickname like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' order by seq desc) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by rnum asc
select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select * from vwClass where name like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' order by seq desc) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by rnum asc
select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select * from vwClass where address like #{searchWord}||'%' order by seq desc) c) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by rnum asc
select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblCategory cc on c.cseq = cc.seq where cc.name = #{searchWord}
select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblShop s on c.sseq = s.seq where s.nickname like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
select count(*) from tblClass c where c.name like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblShop s on c.sseq = s.seq where s.address like #{searchWord}||'%'
select * from tblShop where seq = (select sseq from tblClass where seq = #{cseq})
select tc.membercnt - count(tmc.rmembercnt) as availablecount from tblclass tc inner join tblMemberCLass tmc on tc.seq = tmc.seq where tc.seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tblMemberClass(seq, mseq, cseq, rdate, rmembercnt) values (seqMemberClass.nextVal,(select seq from tblMember where aseq = #{aseq}), #{cseq}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{rmembercnt})
mapper.select: select seq from tblShop where aseq = #{aseq}
mapper.insert: insert into tblClass(seq, cseq, name, intro, course, time, duedate, duetime, membercnt, price, image, sseq) values (seqClass.nextVal, #{cseq}, #{name}, #{intro}, #{course}, #{time}, #{duedate}, #{duetime}, #{membercnt}, #{price}, #{image},#{sseq})
